alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Leon; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 6:24PM EDT until August 05 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Wakulla County in Big Bend of Florida... Southeastern Gadsden County in Big Bend of Florida... Southwestern Leon County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 715 PM EDT. * At 624 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Midway, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Florida State University, Midway, Crawfordville, Tallahassee Community College, Doak Campbell Stadium, Lake Bradford, Shadeville, Leon Sinks, Gaither Community Center, Lake Munson, Wakulla Springs, Walker Ford Community Center, Eight Mile Pond, Griffin Heights, Fred George Park, Callen Neighborhood, Bethel and Tallahassee Regional A/P. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
